## UpdateStateParams interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface UpdateStateParams<GSchema extends EditorSchema = any> extends Partial<TransactionParams<GSchema>>, EditorStateParams<GSchema> 
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [triggerOnChange](./react.updatestateparams.triggeronchange.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Whether or not to trigger this as a change and call any handlers. |
